Description: Small flat sandstone object in the shape of a miniature offering table with a rectangular flat shape and a protruding part at one side. The base is very well smoothed, the upper side is slightly rougher and shows incised lines reminiscent of the pattern of a false door. The incised lines define three elongated parallel bands. The middle one has two short, parallel and horizontal lines.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound β, D15.P, level 2
